structural_issues.impact: RAG 시스템에서 규정 내용을 검색할 수 없음
structural_issues.root_cause: _find_regulation_end() 함수가 TOC 영역을 실제 내용 영역으로 인식하여 조기 종료함

parser_analysis.problem: TOC entries and actual regulation content are in separate sections of the document, but the parser treats TOC entries as content boundaries

example_issue.expected: Should contain multiple articles starting with '제1조 (목적)'
example_issue.root_cause: _find_regulation_end returns line 103 (next TOC entry) instead of finding actual content at line 1043+

recommendations.description: The function should recognize that TOC entries are not actual content boundaries. Need to find the first actual article (제X조) as content start, and the next TOC pattern or document boundary as end.
First pass: identify TOC section boundaries. Second pass: extract content for each regulation using article detection.

recommendations.action: Add content validation in parse() method
recommendations.description: Raise warning if all regulations have empty content arrays
